tasks.label: dapr-sidecar-start
tasks.detail: Start Dapr sidecar (with dapr run) to be present for debugging the VehicleApp (used by launch config).

background.beginsPattern: ^You're up and running! Dapr logs will appear here.

tasks.label: dapr-sidecar-stop
tasks.detail: Stop Dapr sidecar after finish debugging the VehicleApp (used by launch config).

tasks.label: Local Runtime - Up
tasks.detail: Starts up the local runtime

tasks.label: Local Runtime - Run VehicleApp
tasks.detail: Starts the VehicleApp under development (including Dapr sidecar if middleware type is Dapr)
command: velocitas exec runtime-local run-vehicle-app --dapr-app-id vehicleapp --dapr-app-port 50008 python3 ${workspaceFolder}/app/src/main.py

tasks.label: Local Runtime - VehicleDataBroker CLI
tasks.detail: Starts the VehicleDataBroker CLI

tasks.label: Pre Commit Action
tasks.detail: Perform checking/formating of the code

tasks.label: K3D Runtime - Up
tasks.detail: Starts up the K3D runtime.

tasks.label: K3D Runtime - Down
tasks.detail: Stops the K3D runtime

tasks.label: K3D Runtime - Build VehicleApp
tasks.detail: Builds the VehicleApp and pushes it to the local K3D registry.

tasks.label: K3D Runtime - Deploy VehicleApp
tasks.detail: Builds and deploys the VehicleApp via Helm to the K3D cluster.

tasks.label: K3D Runtime - Deploy VehicleApp (without rebuild)
tasks.detail: Deploys the VehicleApp via Helm to the K3D cluster (without rebuilding it)

tasks.label: Import example app from SDK
tasks.detail: Replace the app implementation in the app folder by an example app chosen from SDK repository

tasks.label: (Re-)generate vehicle model
tasks.detail: (Re-)generates the vehicle model from source files specified in the AppManifest.
tasks.command: velocitas exec vehicle-model-lifecycle download-vspec && velocitas exec vehicle-model-lifecycle generate-model

tasks.label: (Re-)generate gRPC SDKs
tasks.detail: (Re-)generates all auto-generated gRPC SDKs used by the app

tasks.label: Kanto Runtime - Down
tasks.detail: Stops the Kanto runtime

tasks.label: Kanto Runtime - Build VehicleApp
tasks.detail: Builds the VehicleApp.

tasks.label: Kanto Runtime - Deploy VehicleApp
tasks.detail: Builds and deploys the VehicleApp via Kanto-cm

tasks.label: Kanto Runtime - Deploy VehicleApp (without rebuild)
tasks.detail: Deploys the VehicleApp via Kanto-cm (without rebuilding it)
